abstract: Princeton offensive lineman Mason Darrow becomes first openly gay football player at school and only openly gay player in major college football right now.
lead_paragraph: Darrow, a junior, is believed to be the only openly gay player in major college football right now.

headline.main: Mason Darrow, Princeton Offensive Lineman, Says He’s Gay
headline.print_headline: A Lineman at Princeton Tells a Website He’s Gay

snippet: Darrow, a junior, is believed to be the only openly gay player in major college football right now.
